name: Classic Cookbooks: Alexis's Brown-Sugar Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: [Photograph: Christine Tsai] When I was five, my mother bought a new kind of cookbook because she was entranced by the pictures within: here were elegant parties and rustic feasts; there was the author working her massive garden, feeding "part...
recipeIngredient: 1 pound (4 sticks) unsalted butter ("at room temperature" is not specified but is presumably meant)

recipeInstructions.text: Cream butter until smooth; add sugars. Beat in eggs and vanilla.
Sift flour, salt, and baking soda and beat into above mixture. Add chocolate chips. Drop 2-3 tablespoons of batter onto greased baking sheet, 2 inches apart. Bake 8 minutes.
Remove from pans and cool on racks.
Note: if cookies become hard while still on the baking sheet, put sheet back into the oven for a few seconds to soften them for easy removal.
